SELECT SYS_GUID() AS guID FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO dict_t_setfix() VALUES( #{guID,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{tableID,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{typeID,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{lvlNanmeCol,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{fdCodeToCols,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{layerIndent,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{refID,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{refWhere,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{colOrder,jdbcType = VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update dict_t_setfix
LVLNANMECOL=#{lvlNanmeCol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FDCODETOCOLS=#{fdCodeToCols,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAYERINDENT=#{layerIndent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REFID=#{refID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where GUID = #{guID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select TABLENAME from dict_t_appcode where APPID = #{appID} and UPPER(OBJECTID) = 'AGENCYID'
select GUID, CODE, NAME, SUPERGUID, ISLEAF, LEVELNO from ${dbTableName} where GUID = '000093B071D445C69F75A02F0F626757'
select t.LVLNANMECOL from dict_t_setfix t where t.TABLEID =#{tableID}
SELECT CSID, (SELECT DBTABLENAME FROM dict_t_modelcode WHERE TABLEID = CSID) as CSDBTABLENAME FROM dict_t_factor WHERE COLUMNID = #{colID}

SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(SUPERID_1) > COUNT(SUPERID_2) AND COUNT(SUPERID_2) > COUNT(SUPERID_3) THEN '1' WHEN COUNT(SUPERID_2) > COUNT(SUPERID_1) AND COUNT(SUPERID_2) > COUNT(SUPERID_3) THEN '2' WHEN COUNT(SUPERID_3) > COUNT(SUPERID_1) AND COUNT(SUPERID_3) > COUNT(SUPERID_2) THEN '3' ELSE '1' END FROM ${tableName} WHERE ISTEMPLATE = '1'
